paragraph.heading: 1Object Browser Hierarchy
paragraph.paragraph:
For every node in the
0 Eiffel Object Browser !DefaultAssociativeIndex>Object Browser , there will be a set of child nodes that you may expand in order to explore relevent informationregarding the current node. For example, if the current node represents a cluster, then the child nodes will be all Eiffel Classes in that cluster. If you subsequently open up one of the child nodes representing an EiffelClass, you will be presented with a new set of nodes, applicable only to an Eiffel Class.

Each node in the
0 Eiffel Object Browser !DefaultAssociativeIndex>Object Browser is represented by a text and an icon. Below is a table of all the icons that may appear in the
0 Eiffel Object Browser !DefaultAssociativeIndex>Object Browser , along details of their functionality.
Icon Definition May Appear For
/images/class_view/all_features.png
All Features Eiffel Class
/images/class_view/ancestors.png
Ancestors Eiffel Class
/images/class_view/class.png
Class Cluster
/images/class_view/class_library.png
Library Class Cluster
/images/class_view/class_library_deferred.png
Library Deferred Class Cluster
/images/class_view/class_not_in_system.png
Class Not in System Cluster
/images/class_view/cluster.png
Cluster Project or Cluster
/images/class_view/cluster_library.png
Library Cluster Project or Cluster
/images/class_view/constant_feature.png
Constant Feature Class
/images/class_view/creation_routines.png
Creation Routines Class
/images/class_view/deferred_class.png
Deferred Class Cluster
/images/class_view/deferred_feature.png
Deferred Feature Class
/images/class_view/external_feature.png
External Feature Class
/images/class_view/feature.png
Feature Class
/images/class_view/frozen_external_feature.png
Frozen External Feature Class
/images/class_view/frozen_feature.png
Frozen Feature Class
/images/class_view/frozen_feature_constant.png
Frozen Constant Feature Class
/images/class_view/frozen_once_feature.png
Frozen Once Feature Class
/images/class_view/obsolete.png
Obsolete Features Class
/images/class_view/once_feature.png
Once Features Class
/images/class_view/project.png
Project Root level of Class View
/images/class_view/assembly.png
Assembly Referenced Assmblies
/images/class_view/constant.png
Constant .Net Enum, Struct, Delegate, Interface or Class
/images/class_view/constantprivate.png
Private Constant .Net Enum, Struct, Delegate, Interface or Class
/images/class_view/constantprotected.png
Constant Protected .Net Enum, Struct, Delegate, Interface or Class
/images/class_view/dotnetclass.png
.Net Class Namespace
/images/class_view/dotnetdelegate.png
.Net Delegate Namespace
/images/class_view/dotnetenum.png
.Net Enum Namespace
/images/class_view/dotnetinterface.png
.Net Interface Namespace
/images/class_view/event.png
Event .Net Enum, Struct, Delegate, Interface or Class
/images/class_view/eventprivate.png
Private Event .Net Enum, Struct, Delegate, Interface or Class

Field .Net Enum, Struct, Delegate, Interface or Class

Field Protected .Net Enum, Struct, Delegate, Interface or Class
/images/class_view/fieldstatic.png
Field Static .Net Enum, Struct, Delegate, Interface or Class
/images/class_view/method.png
Method .Net Enum, Struct, Delegate, Interface or Class
/images/class_view/methodprivate.png
Method Private .Net Enum, Struct, Delegate, Interface or Class
/images/class_view/methodprotected.png
Method Protected .Net Enum, Struct, Delegate, Interface or Class
/images/class_view/namespace.png
Namespace Assembly
/images/class_view/property.png
Property .Net Enum, Struct, Delegate, Interface or Class
/images/class_view/propertyprivate.png
Private Property .Net Enum, Struct, Delegate, Interface or Class
